issue.title: [Go] Run tests with assert build tag enabled
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6946](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6946). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I don't believe the tests are currently running with the -assert build tag in CI. When I enable it, I get panics from a lot of the tests reporting "too many releases".

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6946?focusedCommentId=17422980) by Matthew Topol (zeroshade):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11276
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11276>
